Articles.Content:
Toss a bomb as far as you can and run away!

"Alright, sonny! We have a mission for you! There's a certain payload you have to drop at a certain location. The problem is you can't be anywhere near to it once it hits the target, because of some device the eggheads decided to put in it! So better figure out a way to do that, pilot! If you need any modifications done to your aircraft of choice, just ask the boys at the hangar and I'm sure they'll deliver you something nice and shiny!"

THE RULES:

1. The plane must use one Juno engine only!
2. The plane must be crewed (you mustn't use any probe cores)
3. The bomb must carry a tiny LF tank full of fuel (50 units) as a part of the bomb. It must remain full after the separation!
4. You can use 2 Sepratrons for a boost after decoupling (either on the bomb or the plane to run away, but not on both)
5. You must either take pictures or record a video of your attempt
6. You get +5km to your overall score for hitting the Island Airfield
7. You must try to beat my score and have fun!

I'd prefer if it remained stock parts-wise, but it's OK if you use procedural parts for the plane (the bomb has to have that tiny stock fuel tank though)

Ok so this challenge is actually flawed in stock because the limit is 25km. Unless someone's using some never unload mod it's not worth trying.

BDA has a physics load option, which sets a distance for, well, loading physics. Setting it to extremely high distances could work, although it is risky.
